mapper.insert: insert into currencies(c_id,c_name, c_trading, c_b_trading, c_f_trading) value(#{c_id},(#{c_name},#{c_trading},#{c_b_trading},#{c_f_trading});
mapper.select: select * from currencies order by c_name asc
select c_name from currencies where c_trading = 1 order by c_name asc
select c_name from currencies where c_b_trading = 1 order by c_name asc
select c_name from currencies where c_f_trading = 1 order by c_name asc
